dmca.title: [ABUSE] IMPORTANT:- UNACCEPTABLE SITE/ PERSONAL DATA/ COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT.
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, February 23, 2005 11:34 AM
To: jane@sulake.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] IMPORTANT:- UNACCEPTABLE SITE/ PERSONAL DATA/
COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT.

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Jane O'Holleran <jane@sulake.com>
To: <copyright@theplanet.com>
Date: Wednesday, February 23, 2005, 5:22:10 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] IMPORTANT:- UNACCEPTABLE SITE/ PERSONAL DATA/ COPYRIGHT
INFRINGEMENT.

===8<==============Original message text===============
To whom it may concern,



The site, http://www.wwe-live.com, is hosted by INTEGRITYSERVERS.NET which
is on your network. As INTEGRITYSERVERS.NET has no contact details or a
webpage, I have had to resort to contacting you - Their network/datacenter.



I have spent months chasing down hosts to remove a specific site which goes
by the name of www.krewz.tk (http://www.wwe-live.com/krewzhosting). The
owner of this site has made it purposely to damage our trademark (Habbo).



www.habbohotel.co.uk is an online graphical chat and gaming environment for
teenagers. The site takes the form of a virtual hotel, where each user is
represented by an avatar called a Habbo. Habbos can walk, talk and dance in
all of the hotel's public and private rooms. Private rooms are created by
the Habbos themselves and are furnished by them using Habbo Credits. Users
purchase Habbo Credits using all the normal online payment methods, such as
credit or debit cards, reverse SMS billing, premium rate phone lines and
cheques.



These people are dedicating their lives to damaging our company either by
harassing our employees, creating scripts to interfere with our game,
infringing copyright, rioting within our game and disrupting other users.



Their recent attempt to damage our brand has resulted in this website. The
site contains video of Sulake staff which they are not permitted to have in
their possession or publish. The video was not published to the public on
the internet and is personal property. Please understand that we wish to
keep the details of our employee's private and protect them in anyway we
can. We promote online safety and encourage our users to never post their
pictures online. However, the people running this site are making it
difficult for us to do our jobs as they have being digging around old
documents and personal sites that are over two years old in order to find
our personal info. They have no permission to publish these videos or any
info in connection to Habbo/Sulake.




The site also contains documents ("handbooks") belonging to Sulake Labs.
They are located under "classified" in the website
(http://www.wwe-live.com/krewzhosting/classified.html). These documents are
protected by copyright and only specific people are allowed to have these
documents (paid employees, Hotel guides). This means that they were obtained
unlawfully by the creators of the site and they have now published them
which not only infringes copyright but is actual theft.



We do not allow our customers to use any 3rd party tools or scripting
software and any user found using such scripts are barred from our site. The
site owner has created/published scripts for other users to download and use
within Habbo. This is damaging to our company and since these programs are
made for the sole purpose of disrupting Habbo, we feel that they should be
terminated from this website.



The web site is breaking the following rules stated on your Acceptable Use
Policy:



  a.. Customer shall not post, transmit, re-transmit or store material on or
through any of Services or Products which, in the sole judgment of the
Company (i) is in violation of any local, state, federal or non-United
States law or regulation, (ii) threatening, obscene, indecent, defamatory or
that otherwise could adversely affect any individual, group or entity
(collectively, "Persons") or (iii) violates the rights of any person,
including rights protected by copyright, trade secret, patent or other
intellectual property or similar laws or regulations including, but not
limited to, the installation or distribution of "pirated" or other software
products that are not appropriately licensed for use by Customer. Customer
shall be responsible for determining what laws or regulations are applicable
to its use of the Services and Products




.         Violations of system or network security are strictly prohibited,
and may result in criminal and civil liability. Company investigates all
incidents involving such violations and will cooperate with law enforcement
if a criminal violation is suspected.

Examples of system or network security violations include, without
limitation, the following:

1. Introduction of malicious programs into the network or server (example:
viruses, worms, Trojan Horses, key loggers, and other executables intended
to inflict harm)

.         Company datacenter infrastructure including network, leased
hardware, co-location services, and other hardware located in the facility
may only be used for lawful purposes. Transmission, distribution, or storage
of any information, data or material in violation of United States or state
regulation or law, or by the common law, is prohibited. This includes, but
is not limited to, material protected by copyright, trademark, trade secret,
or other intellectual property rights; including creating, utilizing,
distributing unauthorized copies of software, or the use of BitTorrent or
other types of technologies utilized in the distribution of illegally copied
materials.  If Customer copies, distributes or installs software in defiance
of the license agreement, Customer is violating federal copyright law.
Company will cooperate with all law enforcement agencies in relation to
alleged copyright infringement housed in our datacenters.



.         Data Unlawful or Against the AUP:  Promoting violation of the law
or the AUP by hosting data that facilitates the violation is prohibited,
including but not limited to:



    1.. Hosting web pages that detail the methodology of committing unlawful
acts, or acts violating this AUP.
    2.. Hosting software, scripts, or other resources intended to facilitate
committing unlawful acts, or acts violating this AUP.
    3.. Advertising, transmitting, storing, or using any software, script,
program, product, or service designed to violate this AUP.


As the site is infringing copyright, I have prepared a full copyright
infringement notice that can be found below. I would appreciate it if you
could contact me within 3 working days to let me know the progress of our
request.



Thank you,



Jane O'Holleran

Community Assistant, Sulake UK

www.habbohotel.co.uk

Jane@sulake.com



===================



IMPORTANT:- COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE



Dear Sir/Madam,

The site below, hosted by you, is infringing our copyright. I hereby
confirm that I am authorised to act on behalf of the owner of the
copyright for http://www.habbohotel.co.uk
The owner of this copyright is
Sulake UK Ltd.

www.habbohotel.co.uk is an online graphical chat and gaming environment for
teenagers. The site takes the form of a virtual hotel, where each user is
represented by an avatar called a Habbo. Habbos can walk, talk and dance in
all of the hotel's public and private rooms. Private rooms are created by
the Habbos themselves and are furnished by them using Habbo Credits. Users
purchase Habbo Credits using all the normal online payment methods, such as
credit or debit cards, reverse SMS billing, premium rate phone lines and
cheques.

Our copyright ownership is clearly stated on the site thus:
 'All rights including trademarks, copyright and database rights in this
website and its contents are owned by or licensed to Sulake UK Ltd. All
rights are reserved.'

I have a good faith belief that the use of our material on this
website is not authorised by Sulake UK Ltd, the copyright owner, or the
law.

I hereby confirm that all of the above information is accurate and that
I am authorised to act on behalf of the copyright owner. I state this
under penalty of perjury.

I am thus writing to you to request that this site is removed from
your servers forthwith. Please inform me when this has been effected.


 http://www.wwe-live.com/krewzhosting


Yours sincerely,




:: Jane O'Holleran ::
:: Community Assistant, Sulake UK Ltd ::
:: Jane@sulake.com ::

===8<===========End of original message text===========
